name: Slime Tavern: 2nd Mission
description:
A knight was sent to a 5 level Tavern to eliminate slime for his 2nd Mission!

Eliminate 20 slimes to move into the next level!

---------------------------------------------------------------------Controls:

W - UP                 S - DOWN

A - LEFT               D - RIGHT

Left Click to shoot

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Game assets are made by o_lobster go check the game assets and o_lobster!
